Single Player Mode and General Control:

Swipe up to rotate Tetrimino clockwise.
Swipe left and right to move Tetrimino left and right.

Swipe down to make the block fall to the bottom.Here you will have a chance to swipe left or right before it locks.

You can see the next Tetrimino that will fall into play in the top right section of the screen. After the current falling piece lands, the next one in the queue displayed will begin falling.


Multiplayer Mode
In multiplayer we have 2 modes: seesaw and sabotage.

Seesaw:

In this mode, 2 players play against each other. For each row that one player clears, the other player will have a new row with five randomly chose blocks added up to the bottom.

Sabotage:
 In this mode, 2 players play against each other. For each row that one player clears, the other player will have a randomly chose Tetrimino fall and lock down instantly.
